result.title: First update status report on JPI HDHL performance in social media
result.description: This deliverable is a summary of the output of the activities in task 5.3. It concerns a short update of the status report on the JPI HDHL activities related to social media performed in the second reporting period of the CSA JPI HDHL 2.0. The report describes the activities on various social media platforms and the reach and impact through these activities.
